titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7666

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort, Aug 22 1862.
Hon: D. C. Wickliffe
Sec State
Sir

I have issued & delivered the following Commissions viz:
✓Robert G. Ringo Capt- date 22 aug 1862
✓James M. Taylor 1 Lieut " " " "
✓Nathan S. Dudley 2 Lieut " " " "
✓Minton Eavans Capt " " " "
✓Andrew J. Farrow 1 Lieut " " " "
✓Daniel Hendrickson 2 Lieut " " " "
✓Wm E. Rice Capt -- -- -- --
✓Andrew T. Wood 1 Lieut -- -- -- --
✓John M. Wallingford 2 Lieut " -- -- --
✓Frank Mott Capt -- -- -- --
✓Casper Cartner 1 Lieut -- -- -- --
✓Simon Sumpter 2 Lieut -- -- -- --
✓John G. Rogers Capt -- -- -- --
✓George H. Wheeler 1 Lieut -- -- -- --
✓John F. Moore 2 Lieut -- -- -- --
✓W. D. Ratcliffe Capt date 22 aug 1862
✓Henry L. Ware 1 Lieut " -- " -- " -- "
✓Joseph T. Lokey 2 Lieut -- -- -- --
✓John M. Gray Capt -- -- -- --
✓Thomas Barber 1 Lieut -- -- -- --
✓John R. Taber 2 Lieut -- -- -- --
✓Charles Nute Capt -- -- -- --
✓James C. Biedbower 1 Lieut -- -- -- --
✓Saml. B Kelly 2 " -- -- -- --
✓Lewis M. Clarke Capt -- -- -- --
✓Geo. L. McCord 1 Lieut -- -- -- --
✓Henry C. White 2 Lieut -- -- -- --
✓Joshua Tevis Colo -- 26 aug --
✓R. R. Maltby Lieut Colo -- -- -- --
✓Tho. J. Swan Surg -- 23 -- --
✓Alexander B. Baird Q. Mas -- " -- " -- "
✓Richard T. Jacob Colo -- 22 -- " -- "
✓John Boyle Lieut. Colo -- " -- " -- "
✓John Farriss 1 Major -- " -- " -- "
✓Wm C. Moreau 2 Major -- " -- " -- "
✓Geo. W. Rue 3 Major -- " -- " -- "
✓Frank Hewitt 2 Lieut sup: Capt: Gores -- 18 -- " -- " --

Very Resply
John W. Finnell
Adjt Genl Ky Vols:
